TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IServiceContractGenerationExtension

Docs.summary: 定义协定生成期间调用的方法，这些方法可用于修改为服务协定生成的代码。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 对协定行为（<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension> 类型）实现 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IContractBehavior?displayProperty=nameWithType> 接口可以使您能够修改协定或终结点编译为代码时生成的代码。
通常，在调用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=nameWithType> 或 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 期间，自定义 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A> 会向 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportEndpoint%2A> 集合中插入自定义协定行为。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何在调用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension> 期间向 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 属性添加 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A>。
[!code-csharp[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customwsdlextensions/cs/wsdldocumentationimporter.cs#4)]
下面的代码示例演示了向为服务协定生成的代码中添加注释的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension.GenerateContract%2A> 的实现。
[!code-csharp[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customwsdlextensions/cs/wsdldocumentationimporter.cs#12)]
下面的代码示例演示了对服务协定生成的注释。
[!code-csharp[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customwsdlextensions/cs/newgeneratedcontract.cs#3)] [!code-vb[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customwsdlextensions/cs/newgeneratedcontract.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GenerateContract(class System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext context) cil managed

Docs.param: 代码生成要使用的上下文，以在生成之前修改代码文档。
Docs.summary: 实现此方法可以在开始协定生成过程之前修改代码文档对象模型。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext?displayProperty=nameWithType> 在代码生成之前修改协定、操作或 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator?displayProperty=nameWithType>。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何在调用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension> 期间向 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 属性添加 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A>。
[!code-csharp[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customwsdlextensions/cs/wsdldocumentationimporter.cs#4)]
下面的代码示例演示了向为服务协定生成的代码中添加注释的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension.GenerateContract%2A> 的实现。
[!code-csharp[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customwsdlextensions/cs/wsdldocumentationimporter.cs#12)]
下面的代码示例演示了对服务协定生成的注释。
[!code-csharp[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customwsdlextensions/cs/newgeneratedcontract.cs#3)] [!code-vb[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customwsdlextensions/cs/newgeneratedcontract.vb#3)]
